pr_title: HDDS-3672. Ozone fs failed to list intermediate directory.

timeline.bodyText:
Thanks @ChenSammi for the analysis and the changes.
It looks like the "current time" change is not related to this, please let me know your thoughts.
timeline.author: rakeshadr

replies.bodyText: It's part of another PR.  Will upload a clean patch.
replies.author: ChenSammi

timeline.bodyText: It looks to me an opportunity to add a unit test, can we? Thanks!
timeline.author: rakeshadr

replies.bodyText: I find an easy way to reproduce the issue.  Use "key put" to upload an object with a path like object name, for example "object-dir/object-name", then use "fs -ls" to list the bucket.
replies.author: ChenSammi

timeline.message: HDDS-3672. Ozone fs failed to list intermiedate directory.
